price: ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߲ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߛߐ߫ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߤߌߣߊ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߘߐߕߊ߬ߣߍ߲߬ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُم مِّن رَّحۡمَتِنَا وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ لِسَانَ صِدۡقٍ عَلِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahum min raḥmatinā wajaʿalnā lahum lisāna ṣid'qin ʿaliyyan
